article:
'Profile' is the tenth novel by Chris Westwood, a British author of children's
and young adult fiction. It was first published in 2009, in a self-published edition. [http://www.fantasticfiction.co.uk/w/chris-
westwood/profile.htm Profile at Fantastic Fiction] It is a dark
psychological thriller about a stalker. [http://www.amazon.com/Profile-Chris-
Westwood/dp/140928848X/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1312563529&sr=8-1 Amazon
description]
